org.red5.server
Class ContextLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.red5.server.ContextLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextLoaderMXBean, ShutdownMXBean, Aware, DisposableBean, InitializingBean, ApplicationContextAware
@ManagedResource(objectName="org.red5.server:name=contextLoader,type=ContextLoader",
                 description="ContextLoader")
public class ContextLoader
extends Object
implements ApplicationContextAware, InitializingBean, DisposableBean, ContextLoaderMXBean

Red5 applications loader

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Tiago Jacobs (tiago@imdt.com.br), Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
